name: A journey of the block WebGL
name_original: A journey of the block WebGL
description:
*Note if you experience lag while playing in browser try Windows or macOS version of the game here https://tomeks.itch.io/a-journey-of-the-block

This game is a preludium to a one of the most popular game in the planet (Tetris). In this puzzle/adventure game your task is to assemble the blocks before they get dropped from the top of the tetris game canvas. 

**Controls walk - arrow keys jump - space

**Gameplay  your task is to assemble the block which ends in tetris game, you have to find the right block spawner to form a shape requested, upon ending first territory the block is verified by a very restrictive system. Than you just need to pass a few more obstacles and end the round by jumping into tetris game (don't worry you don't need to play it).
